core.name: Core
core.text: A core rhythm is a normalized form of a rhythm. See [glossary](?page=glossary) and [theory](?page=theory) for details.

aksak.name: Aksak
aksak.text: This category of rhythms origins from ottoman musical theory. [Aksak](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aksak) rhythms consist of several short beats with duration 2 and one long beat with duration 3. These ryhthms are often used in Balkan music.
